rcon_host.description: The hostname and port for RCON on the Factorio server

rcon_pw.description: The password for RCON on the Factorio server

entity_specific_parameters.description: A map of additional entity-specific parameters to be passed to create_entity (https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/LuaSurface.html#LuaSurface.create_entity)

force.description: The force of this LuaEntity, eg. "player", "enemy", "neutral" (https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/LuaControl.html#LuaControl.force)

name.description: The prototype name of the LuaEntity (https://wiki.factorio.com/Prototype_definitions)

surface.description: The LuaSurface on which the LuaEntity is placed (https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/LuaSurface.html)

unit_number.description: unit_number is Factorio's concept of an ID

block.description: A LuaEntity in Factorio (https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/LuaEntity.html), see LuaSurface.create_entity for creation reference (https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/LuaSurface.html#LuaSurface.create_entity)

create_as_ghost.description: Used only at time of creation. Whether to create a ghost or the actual entity.

block.description: A message made of conveyor belts. Not very useful.
